thread.title: MOLLY
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by MOLLY

author: MOLLY
title: MOLLY
text: Red spot are so easy to deal with. It was my first time renting a car and being under 25 I was worried about extra costs, but it was all outlined clearly and they made me feel just like any driver. Great quick and easy customer service. Dropping the car back was as easy as handing over the keys
